text: Anthony Lamar King (born 22 January 1985) is an American-born, naturalised Cypriot professional basketball player for Keravnos of the Cypriot League. He represented Cyprus' national basketball team at the EuroBasket 2017 qualification, where he was his team's best rebounder and shot blocker.FIBA EuroBasket 2017, FIBA.com, accessed 07 Jan 2017. ==See also== * List of NCAA Division I men's basketball players with 13 or more blocks in a game ==References== ==External links== * FIBA profile * ESPN profile * Eurobasket.com profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Cyprus Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:American expatriate basketball people in Turkey Category:American men's basketball players Category:Aris B.C. players Category:Artland Dragons players Category:Basketball players from North Carolina Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Cypriot men's basketball players Category:Cypriot people of African- American descent Category:Expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:Expatriate basketball people in Turkey Category:Gaziantep Basketbol players Category:Keravnos B.C. players Category:Köln 99ers players Category:Miami Hurricanes men's basketball players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Skyliners Frankfurt players Category:Sportspeople from Durham, North Carolina
title: Anthony King (basketball)
